'''Peculiar Pinion''' is a Gadget obtained during the World Quest [[Octave of the Maushiro]]. It can be equipped to activate [[Mysterious Carvings]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

Similar to the [[Memento Lens]], its UI icon on the Gadget slot will sparkle when near a valid location to use it.
